channel.title: How to make a Coder rank?
channel.description: [size=12pt]You know how there is a "Donator" rank and how you get the donator crown? How would I make another group called "Coder" and add a "crown.PNG" and enable the coder to have the same power as a admin. By the way this is for a "Dannyscape" 317 Delta source.[/size] [b]Thanks a lot! -Jim[/b]

item.title: How to make a Coder rank?
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

There’s a tutorial on how to change crowns…

But I’d suggest making the yell tag’s like…

[Coder]
[Owner]
[Admin]
[Mod]
[Donator]

ect ect.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a Coder rank?

item.title: How to make a Coder rank?
item.dc:creator: @agfy25 agfy25
item.description:
@agfy25 wrote:

Why not just just give her/him owner rank? Or make double commands.. Say like

::ban is just for you. Make two ban commands and make the other one just for him.


:S It’s because I want people to distinguish from the Admin’s and the Coder’s. Coders don’t moderate people am I right? They code things and test 'em.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a Coder rank?

item.title: How to make a Coder rank?

How would I make another group called “Coder” and add a “crown.PNG” and enable the coder to have the same power as a admin. By the way this is for a “Dannyscape” 317 Delta source.[/size]
Thanks a lot!
-Jim[/quote]

Why not just just give her/him owner rank?
Or make double commands… Say like

::ban is just for you. Make two ban commands and make the other one just for him.
